successes.title: Monkey Light Pro - Bicycle Wheel Display System
successes.description: Display images and animations on your bike wheel.  Download your own graphics to the Monkey Light Pro and show them while you ride.

Pledges.description: Monkey Light Sticker Pack - A pack of high quality stickers you can put on your bike, or anywhere.  Plus: our thanks for supporting us!
Monkey Light T-shirt.  Black shirt with White logo.  All Men's and Women's sizes will be available.
Monkey Light Pro - Super Early Bird $495 - Be one of the first to pledge and get the Monkey Light Pro at a special price.
Monkey Light Pro - Take it easy $660.  Give us a break on delivery time and we'll give you a break on the price.  Thanks!

Monkey Light Pro - Early Bird $795,   
and 2 x Monkey Light T-shirts.
Monkey Light Pro - Retail price, and 2 x Monkey Light T-shirts.
Powered Display Stand including:  1 Monkey Light Pro, SM1 Display Stand, Bike Wheel.  This is a fully assembled display for indoor continuous use, such as a museum, shop window, or other display.
Monkey Light Pro PAIR - Super Early Bird $495 x 2 - Be one of the first to pledge and get the Monkey Light Pro at a special price.
Monkey Light Pro PAIR - Early Bird $595 x 2
Monkey Light Pro PAIR - Take it easy $595 x 2.  Give us a break on delivery time and we'll give you a break on the price.  Thanks!
Monkey Light Pro PAIR - Early Bird $695 x 2
Monkey Light Pro PAIR - Early Bird $745 x 2, and Monkey Light T-shirts x 2.
Monkey Light Pro PAIR - $845 x 2 - Retail price, and Monkey Light T-shirts x 2.
Monkey Light Pro TRIPLE for your TRICYCLE - Take it easy $595 x 3. Give us a break on delivery time and we'll give you a break on the price. Thanks!
Ready-to-Ride: In collaboration with Linus Bikes we are pleased to offer a Ready-to-Ride option. We'll pre-install 2 Monkey Light Pro's on a Linus Roadster Classic bicycle.
Other ready-to-ride Linus models available by request.
